text: Yum!  Stopped for a quick bite and this time opted for the Kosher Hot Dog....it was the juiciest hot dog! Loved it.

I am a burger lover and with that comes fries.  With over three decades worth of culinary consumption, I must laud that this place has the best burgers and fries, hands down, no ifs ands or buts about it. If you want a great burger and awesome fries, come here. You won't be disappointed!

Great burgers and fries! All the toppings you could ask for!
Staff is always very friendly, food is always fresh! The only downside is its a bit pricey for burgers, but the quality makes up for it!
Unless you are a glutton for punishment, or have a family of 4 to feed stick with the regular size fries!
